tags.name: vc-imagery-provider-urltemplate
tags.description: Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides imagery by requesting tiles using a specified URL template. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.UrlTemplateImageryProvider` instance.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: `required` The URL template to use to request tiles.

attributes.name: pick-features-url
attributes.description: `optional` The URL template to use to pick features.

attributes.name: url-scheme-zero-padding
attributes.description: `optional` Gets the URL scheme zero padding for each tile coordinate.

attributes.name: subdomains
attributes.description: `optional` The subdomains to use for the {s} placeholder in the URL template. If this parameter is a single string, each character in the string is a subdomain. If it is an array, each element in the array is a subdomain.

attributes.name: credit
attributes.description: `optional` A credit for the data source, which is displayed on the canvas.

attributes.name: minimum-level
attributes.description: `optional` The minimum level-of-detail supported by the imagery provider. Take care when specifying this that the number of tiles at the minimum level is small, such as four or less. A larger number is likely to result in rendering problems.

attributes.name: maximum-level
attributes.description: `optional` The maximum level-of-detail supported by the imagery provider, or undefined if there is no limit.

attributes.name: rectangle
attributes.description: `optional` The rectangle, in radians, covered by the image.

attributes.name: tiling-scheme
attributes.description: `optional` The tiling scheme specifying how the ellipsoidal surface is broken into tiles. If this parameter is not provided, a WebMercatorTilingScheme is used.

attributes.name: ellipsoid
attributes.description: `optional` The ellipsoid. If the tilingScheme is specified, this parameter is ignored and the tiling scheme's ellipsoid is used instead. If neither parameter is specified, the WGS84 ellipsoid is used.

attributes.name: tile-width
attributes.description: `optional` Pixel width of image tiles.

attributes.name: tile-height
attributes.description: `optional` Pixel height of image tiles.

attributes.name: has-alpha-channel
attributes.description: `optional` true if the images provided by this imagery provider include an alpha channel; otherwise, false. If this property is false, an alpha channel, if present, will be ignored. If this property is true, any images without an alpha channel will be treated as if their alpha is 1.0 everywhere. When this property is false, memory usage and texture upload time are potentially reduced.

attributes.name: get-feature-info-formats
attributes.description: `optional` The formats in which to get feature information at a specific location when UrlTemplateImageryProvider#pickFeatures is invoked. If this parameter is not specified, feature picking is disabled.

attributes.name: enable-pick-features
attributes.description: `optional` If true, UrlTemplateImageryProvider#pickFeatures will request the options.pickFeaturesUrl and attempt to interpret the features included in the response. If false, UrlTemplateImageryProvider#pickFeatures will immediately return undefined (indicating no pickable features) without communicating with the server. Set this property to false if you know your data source does not support picking features or if you don't want this provider's features to be pickable. Note that this can be dynamically overridden by modifying the UriTemplateImageryProvider#enablePickFeatures property.

attributes.name: custom-tags
attributes.description: `optional` Allow to replace custom keywords in the URL template. The object must have strings as keys and functions as values.

attributes.name: projection-transforms
attributes.description: `optional` Specify the projection transformation parameters.

events.name: before-load
events.description: Triggers before the cesiumObject is loaded.

events.name: ready
events.description: Triggers when the cesiumObject is successfully loaded.

events.name: destroyed
events.description: Triggers when the cesiumObject is destroyed.

events.name: error-event
events.description: Triggers when the imagery provider encounters an asynchronous error.

events.name: ready-promise
events.description: Triggers when the provider is ready for use.

tags.name: vc-imagery-provider-wms
tags.description: Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery hosted by a Web Map Service

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: `required` The URL of the WMS service. The URL supports the same keywords as the UrlTemplateImageryProvider.

attributes.name: layers
attributes.description: `required` The layers to include, separated by commas.

attributes.name: parameters
attributes.description: `optional` Additional parameters to pass to the WMS server in the GetMap URL.

attributes.name: get-feature-info-parameters
attributes.description: `optional` Additional parameters to pass to the WMS server in the GetFeatureInfo URL.

attributes.name: enable-pick-features
attributes.description: `optional` If true, WebMapServiceImageryProvider#pickFeatures will invoke the GetFeatureInfo operation on the WMS server and return the features included in the response. If false, WebMapServiceImageryProvider#pickFeatures will immediately return undefined (indicating no pickable features) without communicating with the server. Set this property to false if you know your WMS server does not support GetFeatureInfo or if you don't want this provider's features to be pickable. Note that this can be dynamically overridden by modifying the WebMapServiceImageryProvider#enablePickFeatures property.

attributes.name: get-feature-info-formats
attributes.description: `optional` The formats in which to try WMS GetFeatureInfo requests.

attributes.name: rectangle
attributes.description: `optional` The rectangle of the layer.

attributes.name: tiling-scheme
attributes.description: `optional` The tiling scheme to use to divide the world into tiles.

attributes.name: ellipsoid
attributes.description: `optional` The ellipsoid. If the tilingScheme is specified, this parameter is ignored and the tiling scheme's ellipsoid is used instead. If neither parameter is specified, the WGS84 ellipsoid is used.

attributes.name: tile-width
attributes.description: `optional` The width of each tile in pixels.

attributes.name: tile-height
attributes.description: `optional` The height of each tile in pixels.

attributes.name: minimum-level
attributes.description: `optional` The minimum level-of-detail supported by the imagery provider. Take care when specifying this that the number of tiles at the minimum level is small, such as four or less. A larger number is likely to result in rendering problems.

attributes.name: maximum-level
attributes.description: `optional` The maximum level-of-detail supported by the imagery provider, or undefined if there is no limit. If not specified, there is no limit.

attributes.name: crs
attributes.description: `optional` CRS specification, for use with WMS specification >= 1.3.0.

attributes.name: srs
attributes.description: `optional` SRS specification, for use with WMS specification 1.1.0 or 1.1.1

attributes.name: credit
attributes.description: `optional` A credit for the data source, which is displayed on the canvas.

attributes.name: subdomains
attributes.description: `optional` The subdomains to use for the {s} placeholder in the URL template. If this parameter is a single string, each character in the string is a subdomain. If it is an array, each element in the array is a subdomain.

attributes.name: clock
attributes.description: `optional` A Clock instance that is used when determining the value for the time dimension. Required when options.times is specified.

attributes.name: times
attributes.description: `optional` TimeIntervalCollection with its data property being an object containing time dynamic dimension and their values.

events.name: before-load
events.description: Triggers before the cesiumObject is loaded.

events.name: ready
events.description: Triggers when the cesiumObject is successfully loaded.

events.name: destroyed
events.description: Triggers when the cesiumObject is destroyed.

events.description: Triggers when the imagery provider encounters an asynchronous error.

events.description: Triggers when the provider is ready for use.

tags.name: vc-imagery-provider-wmts
tags.description: Loading a tiled imagery provider that provides tiled imagery served by [WMTS 1.0.0]

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: `required`The base URL for the WMTS GetTile operation (for KVP-encoded requests) or the tile-URL template (for RESTful requests). The tile-URL template should contain the following variables: {style}, {TileMatrixSet}, {TileMatrix}, {TileRow}, {TileCol}. The first two are optional if actual values are hardcoded or not required by the server. The {s} keyword may be used to specify subdomains.

attributes.name: format
attributes.description: `optional` The MIME type for images to retrieve from the server.

attributes.name: wmts-style
attributes.description: `required`The layer name for WMTS requests.

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: `required`The style name for WMTS requests.

attributes.name: tile-matrix-set-i-d
attributes.description: `required`The identifier of the TileMatrixSet to use for WMTS requests.

attributes.name: tile-matrix-labels
attributes.description: `optional` A list of identifiers in the TileMatrix to use for WMTS requests, one per TileMatrix level.

attributes.name: clock
attributes.description: `optional` A Clock instance that is used when determining the value for the time dimension. Required when options.times is specified.

attributes.name: times
attributes.description: `optional` TimeIntervalCollection with its data property being an object containing time dynamic dimension and their values.

attributes.name: dimensions
attributes.description: `optional` A object containing static dimensions and their values.

attributes.name: tile-width
attributes.description: `optional` The tile width in pixels.

attributes.name: tile-height
attributes.description: `optional` The tile height in pixels.

attributes.name: tiling-scheme
attributes.description: `optional` The tiling scheme corresponding to the organization of the tiles in the TileMatrixSet.

attributes.name: rectangle
attributes.description: `optional` The rectangle covered by the layer.

attributes.name: minimum-level
attributes.description: `optional` The minimum level-of-detail supported by the imagery provider.

attributes.name: maximum-level
attributes.description: `optional` The maximum level-of-detail supported by the imagery provider, or undefined if there is no limit.

attributes.name: ellipsoid
attributes.description: `optional` The ellipsoid. If not specified, the WGS84 ellipsoid is used.

attributes.name: subdomains
attributes.description: `optional` The subdomains to use for the {s} placeholder in the URL template. If this parameter is a single string, each character in the string is a subdomain. If it is an array, each element in the array is a subdomain.

tags.name: vc-terrain-provider-arcgis
tags.description: Loading a terrain provider that produces terrain geometry by tessellating height maps retrieved from Elevation Tiles of an ArcGIS ImageService. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.ArcGISTiledElevationTerrainProvider` instance.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: `required` The URL of the ArcGIS ImageServer service.

attributes.name: token
attributes.description: `optional` The authorization token to use to connect to the service.

attributes.name: ellipsoid
attributes.description: `optional` The ellipsoid. If the tilingScheme is specified, this parameter is ignored and the tiling scheme's ellipsoid is used instead. If neither parameter is specified, the WGS84 ellipsoid is used.

tags.name: vc-terrain-provider-cesium
tags.description: Loading a terrain provider that accesses terrain data in a Cesium terrain format. It is equivalent to initializing a `Cesium.CesiumTerrainProvider` instance. If the `url` is empty, the CesiumIon online global terrain will be loaded via `Cesium.createWorldTerrain` by default. CesiumIon authorization is required. For details, go to [`https://cesium.com/ion/`]

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: `required` The URL of the Cesium terrain server.

attributes.name: request-vertex-normals
attributes.description: `optional` Flag that indicates if the client should request additional lighting information from the server, in the form of per vertex normals if available.

attributes.name: request-water-mask
attributes.description: `optional` Flag that indicates if the client should request per tile water masks from the server, if available.

attributes.name: request-metadata
attributes.description: `optional` Flag that indicates if the client should request per tile metadata from the server, if available.

attributes.name: ellipsoid
attributes.description: `optional` The ellipsoid. If not specified, the WGS84 ellipsoid is used.

attributes.name: credit
attributes.description: `optional` A credit for the data source, which is displayed on the canvas.
